device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
devices_included: Phone; Tablet; Tabletop, large horizontal display
contribution_desc:
Presents a technique for integration of mobile phones and interactive surfaces. Enables use of phones to select targets on the surface by direct touch, facilitating for instance pick&drop-style transfer of objects between
phone and surface.
tracking_characteristic: Location 2D; Synchronous events; Inside-out tracking; Outside-in tracking
